lines.dialogueText: You return to the shop to hand over the metal box you found.

Ah, you’re back, my good customer.
So… did you manage to find that iron box?
Yeah, I think this is the box you were talking about.

Let me take a look at that… 
hmm, I’m afraid this isn’t quite the box I was looking for.
The one I need is a bit larger than this.

Tell you what—I'll hold on to this one for now.
If you happen to find another metal box, bring it to me and I’ll take a look again.
